title: Permaban??
body: i think someone has acess to my account?? why am i perma banned i just spent 150$ on rp last week?? can a rioter help me resolve this please.

replies.body: please tell me if you get unbanned or not

Hey there, it looks like your account was suspended for behavioral reasons.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our PB team can offer more context.
